name: @vscode/dwarf-debugging
description: Enables DWARF debugging of webassembly in js-debug

scripts.test: npm run build-meta && node --import tsx --test test/*.test.ts test/e2e/*.test.ts
scripts.build: npm run build-native-ext-image && npm run build-native-ext && npm run build-meta
scripts.build-meta: rimraf dist && tsc -p . && cp ./wasm/symbols-backend.build/stage-2/gen/* dist && cp src/*.d.ts dist && npm run vscode-js-debug-compat-dist

author: Connor Peet <connor@peet.io>
